data.title: Stephen Koschal, Autograph Authenticator, Quality Historical Autographs and Signed Books Bought and Sold
data.meta_description:
Buying and selling rare, historical, and quality autographs, manuscripts, signed books, 
letters, signatures, signed photos, and documents signed by authors, vintage Hollywood actors, Judaica, presidents, Pulitzer prize winners, 
Nobel Laureates, founding fathers, astronauts, generals, Civil War leaders, Supreme Court Justices, signers of the Declaration of Independence, artists,
literary personalities and notable writers, the field of aviation and exploration, undesirables and infamous personalities, world leaders, 
and historical personalities in the field of collecting to collector's of autographs.

Famous German Ace - Killed in Combat

GALLAND, William-Ferdinand “Wutz” (1914-17 August 1943). A Major in the German Luftwaffe. Flew with the JG 26 and credited with 55 victories. He flew 186 combat missions. He was one of the 4 Galland brothers to serve in the Luftwatffe and was a younger brother of Adolf Galland. He was shot down and killed in action by American Ace Bud Mahurin of the 56th fighter group. Rare A.L.S. one and a half pages signed “Wutz.” Not translated and in fine conditionâ¦ Together with a T.L.S. one page, 27 August 1991 on the letterhead of National Security Industrial Association to autograph collector/dealer Doug Miller by Walker “Bud‘ Mahurin............SOLD
